summary: An ordinance relating to the valuation, for taxation purposes, of the leasehold interest of the Metropolitan Building Company, a corporation, in the property known commonly as the "University Grounds", in the City of Seattle; directing the Corporation Counsel to petition the Board of Equalization of King County to increase the valuation of said leasehold from $1,400,000.00 to the sum of $6,000,000.00 and declaring an emergency.
